title: Lavender crème caramel with lavender shortbread
description: This fancy dessert uses dried garden lavender - try cooking it for your most discerning friends. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need 6 ramekins and a 30x20cm/12x8in baking tin.
ingredients: ½-1 tbsp dried lavender tips (to taste)
175g/6oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
½-1 tbsp dried lavender tips (to taste)
